content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ the **summer house crochet bag** is the epitome of practicality and style this versatile accessory merges the convenience of a cross-body fanny pack with the charm of crochet craftsmanship offering hands-free ease for on-the-go adventures this beautifully textured bag is made in one piece side to side with increases and decreases in the third loop then we will seam the ends and attach a fun strap for added flair this cross-body bag pattern comes with a video tutorial 1 crochet hook g 4 0mm - or size to meet gauge 2 notions removable stitch marker 3 yarn needle to weave in ends 4 scissors 5 cross-body strap 6 yarn dishie cotton 7 100% cotton 190yds/100g or comfy worsted 8 75% pima cotton 25% acrylic 109yds/50g yarn substitutes comfy color mist 9 75% pima cotton 25% acrylic 219yds/100g lion brand made with love 10 60% cotton 40% acrylic 185yds/100g yardage solid color 225 yds 2 balls abbreviations chain - chain blo - back loop only half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet hdc2tog - half_double_crochet two together rs - right side single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es gauge 22 sts and 15 row = 4 by 4 in half_double_crochet in the third loop not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 11 sizes one size -
